name: cycle-monorepo-sandbox-jsonp
description: A Cycle.js Driver for making HTTP requests through JSONP
author: Andre Staltz

scripts.browserify: ../node_modules/.bin/browserify src/index.js -t babelify -t browserify-shim --standalone CycleJSONPDriver --exclude xstream --outfile dist/cycle-jsonp-driver.js
scripts.dist: npm run browserify && npm run uglify && npm run docs
scripts.version: npm run dist && npm run readme
scripts.postversion: git add -A && git commit -m "release(${PWD##*/}): v$(cat package.json | ../node_modules/.bin/jase version)" && git push origin master && npm publish
